item.title: Dschinghis Khan - Moskau
item.description:
작곡: Ralp…, Bernd Meinunger / 작사: Words & Music by
KY: 60286

Moskau fremd und
geheimnisvoll
Turme aus
rotem gold
Kalt wie das
eis
Moskau doch wer dich
wirklich kennt
Der weiB ein
feuer brennt
In dir so
heiB
Kosaken hey hey hey
hebt die glaser
Natascha ha ha ha
du bist schon
Tovarisch hey hey hey
auf das leben
Auf dein wohl bruder
he bruder ho
Moskau
Moskau
Wirf die glaser
an die wand
Russland ist ein
schones land
Ha ha ha ha ha
hey
Moskau
Moskau
Deine seele
ist so groB
Nachts da ist der
teufel los
Ha ha ha ha ha
hey

Liebe schmeckt
wie kaviar
Madchen sind zum
kussen da
Ha ha ha ha ha
hey

Komm wir tanzen
auf dem tisch
Bis der tisch
zusammenbricht

tor zur vergangenheit

zarenzeit

blut

item.title: Dschinghis Khan - Genghis Khan
item.description:
작곡: Sung by / 작사: MEINUNGER BERND, SIEGEL RALPH
KY: 60549 / KY: 21002

Hu ha hu ha
hu ha hu ha
Hu ha hu ha
hu ha hu ha
Hu ha hu ha
hu ha hu ha
They rode the
fastest horses
Left the
wind behind
Thousand men
(Ha hu ha)
And one man led the
way the others
Followed by Genghis
Khan (Ha hu ha)
They galloped
over mountains
And desert sands
They carried
Desolation
throughout the land
And nothing
there could
Stop them in
this world (Hu ha)
Gen gen
Genghis Khan
Hey rider
ho rider
Go rider
let us follow
Gen gen
Genghis Khan
Hey brother
ho brother
Hey brother
hear us holler
Who cares
where we’re going
Ho ho ho ho
There’s no
Way of knowing
ha ha ha ha
And we’ll let the
Devil take our souls
Gen gen Genghis Khan
Hey rider ho rider
Go rider
let us follow
Gen Gen
Genghis Khan
Go brother
dream brother
Dance brother
hear us holler
You can
hear his laughter
Ho ho ho ho
Now and ever after
Ha ha ha ha
When he lifts his
Glass up in the air
He was the greatest
Lover and the
strongest man
Of his day
(Ha hu ha)
And we have heard that
all the women
Fell for him
so they say
(Ha hu ha)
And he bred
Seven children
in one whole night
He had his
girls around him
At his
very sight
And nothing
that could
Stop him in
this world (Hu ha)
Gen gen Genghis Khan
Hey rider ho rider
Go rider
let us follow
Gen gen
Genghis Khan
Hey brother
ho brother
Hey brother
hear us holler
Who cares
where we’re going
Ho ho ho ho
There’s no
Way of knowing
ha ha ha ha
And we’ll let the
Devil take our souls
Gen gen Genghis Khan
Hey rider ho rider
Go rider
let us follow
Gen Gen
Genghis Khan
Go brother
dream brother
Dance brother
hear us holler
You can
hear his laughter
Ho ho ho ho
Now and ever after
Ha ha ha ha
When he lifts his
Glass up in the air
